entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:11 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 3:03 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 4.3°C
Pressure: 99.4 kPa
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 3.9°C
Wind: SE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 late this afternoon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Local blowing snow. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
